biotools.summary: Virus-Host Network is a knowledge-base system dedicated to the curation, the integration, the management and the analysis of virus-host molecular (mainly protein-protein) interaction networks as well as their functional annotation (molecular functions, cellular pathways, protein domains). VirHostNet contains high quality and up-to-date information gathered and curated from public databases.
